description: Segawa Takako is the wife of late http://anidb.net/ch149068 [Satoshi]. After her husband`s death she moved out to live with her daughter. She later rented the house that she and Satoshi had lived in to Mr. http://anidb.net/ch149067 [Toono] and his wife, http://anidb.net/ch149066 [Sawako].
name: Segawa Takako
